channel.title: Table Data RSS Feed

item.title: Commission representative(s): Stig Joergen Gren, Acting Director - Date: 30/01/2025
item.description:
Commission representative(s): Stig Joergen Gren, Acting Director
Date: 30/01/2025
Location: Brussels, Belgium, DGT ROOM J-59 003/A069 (and Microsoft Teams)
Interest representative(s): Red Hat Limited (Red Hat)
Subject matter: The core purpose of the proposed meeting would be an initial get-to-know you as well as (i) share Red Hat's perspective on open source AI and (ii) exchange views on this technology and DGT's related exploration/development.
Meeting minutes: Expand mission details
